title: Crash Loop
body:
Today, I had crash loop twice during loading screen.
I played four games but the crash loop happens when i play with {{champion:37}}  , When i play with other champions nothing occur and the game runs smoothly.
I restarted the router , restarted client about 3 or 4 times but no luck!

replies.body:
That's super weird. Can you reproduce this 100% by loading into a few custom matches with no human players and select Sona each time? 

Let me know what happens.
